Articles.Content:
Yet another concept design made by accident. I was testing around with the largest C7 wings (I usually never use them), but I found a way to make them both strikingly cool-looking, simple, and super effective.

No weaponry just yet, I have many other designs to get out of my system first. But if you really want to see fireballs in the air go right ahead to the Forty-Two Industries thread and slap on some missiles!

(lets just say my next one is twice as big!)

My Shiva-84 laughs at your puny x-wing!

I must admit, your looks rather cleaner though.

My Shiva-84 laughs at your puny x-wing!

I must admit, your looks rather cleaner though.

Yes, this was made a few hours ago, then spontaneously interrupted by christmas gift wrapping; duty calls!

Intended for a community-friendly download to prevent framerate issues, but your Shiva is impressive. May want to work on the amount of fuel you have available though!

Challenge accepted

'(lets just say my next one is twice as big!)'

Prepare to get shown up!
Well, I just tested my resdesign, and I got to 9000m/s in the atmosphere, we\'ll see who laughs last!

Well, I just tested my resdesign, and I got to 9000m/s in the atmosphere, we\'ll see who laughs last!

The Hawk\'s mom will, the Falcon! 8)
